summary: This document is a bank statement from Fifth Third Bank for the account of Disco Scientia Corporation for the period of July 1, 2016, to July 31, 2016. It details the account balance, transactions, and service charges, highlighting that the account did not meet the criteria for waiving service charges.

persons.name: Cesar Taverns
persons.context: Cesar Taverns is identified as the relationship manager for the account holder, Disco Scientia Corporation.

keyFacts: The account belongs to Disco Scientia Corporation.
The statement covers the period from July 1, 2016, to July 31, 2016.
The ending balance for the account was $356.26.
The account did not meet the criteria for waiving service charges.
A prohibition on certain payment methods for telemarketing activities was noted.
